revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Annotate Priscella, Aunt Sally, Printard, Maggy Trip

body.p: i got your letter to day and lilliesLillie's and the graphic i wrote you a long letter on tuesday Tuesday did you get it walterWalter when you write say if you got it it was the 1 of april April i wrote if you write to prissellaPriscilla or lillieLillie or aunt sally her name is aunt sally mead aunt phoebe was named pintard she is dead years ago aunt sally is the only one left out of 8 sisters) priscillaPriscilla has a sister named maggyMaggy trip you saw her to our house you must send your love to her also when you write i wish you would write to them walterWalter this is my last envelope

walt did you ever hear of the galvanic battery for panalasis paralasis some thinks its very beneficial waltWalt you say sometimes you are writing at your desk well i am writing this down stairs all alone i have been on my feet all day and now i can hardly walk i cooked the dinner and made a pies and made some cake i was very tired when i washed the dinner dshesdishes) Lou and her aunt is up stairs waiting for the doctor to come) i am amused sometimes and sometimes i feel mad for instance this morning her aunt took up her breakfast on a waiter while i fried indianIndian cakes and in a few minutes louLou was down stairs —

sometimes georgeGeorge carries her up) its seems so different from what i have always had to go through) i should like to go to greenportGreenport if i can this summer i wrote to maryMary i though maybee maybe i would come but i havent haven't had a word from her since maybee maybe she dident didn't get my letter) write as often as you can walterWalter dear and say if you got my letter of tuesday Tuesdayapril April i wrote
